title: Can I use the same 'comment content' at many blogs? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are as many questions that sound similar to many but there is a different perspective behind those questions. Questions are categorized as : Simple questionOpen Question.One word answer questionMultiple choice question, etc.When questions vary so does the answer too. There are different techniques and strategies. As a fact, one can also write the same answer in other words too and it’s not at all mandatory to load it with heavy vocabulary. Writing the same comment answer might look like the promotion of something which gets caught by many as well as search engines. Simple and brief clarifications are always key to your writings, as the intention of questions is to get a satisfactory answer.
